Review.Titre: GTA5 mods for a great price!
Review.Contenu: I have not played GTA5 in a very long time. I discovered RecoveryKings by simply typing into google "2Take1 mod menu GTA5" which I am very fortunate to have stumbled upon. Another thing that I love about RecoveryKings is that they sold GTA5 accounts as well. I made the purchase of a GTA5 account and 2Take1 VIP for 40 days. My goal is that if I don't get banned within the 40 days, I will buy the 2Take1 VIP lifetime. Anyways let me start off with @Sentimental in the discord server. From start to finish he helped me out with every step of the way. Very helpful I would give more than 5 stars for his efforts helping if I could. @Sentimental was patient with me every step of the way, not even getting annoyed when I asked dumb questions. Seriously I am not kidding when I say this bravo pat yourself on the back you did an amazing job. I would honestly recommend RecoveryKings to everyone who is looking to mod GTA5 or any other game for that matter. Overall my experience so far has been amazing. I will be sure to provide an update after the 40 days is over. Words can't express how pleased I am with RecoveryKings. The support alone was unbelievable. Absolutely amazing.
This service is instant, I bought the account, followed the instructions and logged in, changed the password and email, Everything was ready and good. I love this service. I recomend buying.
